titleStmt.title: Infants baptizing proved lawfull by the Scriptures: objections against it resolved and removed. Aug. 24. 1644. Imprimatur, John White.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Miller dwelling in Black-Friers,

notesStmt.note: Variants: a) "Imprimatur" spelled "Imprmiatur"; title page has "Aug. 24. 1644."; b) "Imprimatur" spelled "Imprmiatur"; title page lacks "Aug. 24. 1644.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
